sledgehammer.manager

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.manager.Manager
        • sledgehammer.manager.EventManagerOld

  • public class EventManager
extends Manager
    Manager class designed to organize EventListeners and execution of Events.
    Author:
    Jab

      • getCommandListeners

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<CommandListener>> getCommandListeners()
        Returns:
        Returns the Map of registered CommandListeners, organized as Lists with the given command as a key, in lower-case.
